item.name: Accolade Wines
item.description: Accolade Wines is the newly created and named business that was acquired by a private equity group (CHAMP) from Constellation Wines of the US in June 2011. The principal Australian brands owned by Accolade are Amberley, Banrock Station, Bay of Fires/House of Arras, Brookland Valley, Goundrey, Hardys, Houghton, Leasingham, Moondah Brook, Reynella, Tintara and Yarra Burn. Exports to all major markets.
